overview: Terry has joined forces with the best nutrition company in the world to nourish people around the world through the highest quality live whole food nutrition and life-affirming education. Terry also believes that what you put into your mind and heart is as important as what you put into your mouth. His commitment, therefore, is to provide the information and education which supports a lifestyle of goodness, which include: proper nourishment for our customersâ€”through our line of live whole food products, self-reliance for our distributorsâ€”made possible by our progressive approach to network marketing, health and nutrition education for everyoneâ€”including developing countries the world overâ€”disseminated through our non-profit partners, My Firm Foundation and The Tenth Solution. Mr. Frazier believes that by sharing Nuriche with others, he not only contributes to their improved health and well-being. But, also helps to fund related humanitarian endeavors around the globe.
